rules_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it.)[/i]
When Face Certain Doom enters the battlefield, search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest face down in a random order. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order.
If you would draw a card, instead put a random card exiled with Face Certain Doom into its owner’s hand.
